invariants.statement: Local metric weights are non-negative or sign-constrained according to domain definition.
invariants.formal: For any μ-weight field, μ(x) ∈ AllowedRange (e.g., μ(x) ≥ 0 for Riemannian-like structure).

invariants.statement: μ-decorated δ-geometry (μ-δ operators) must respect underlying adjacency integrity.
invariants.formal: Application of μ-δ-Jacobian or μ-δ-Laplacian may not create illegal adjacency relations.
